'''Frankie Lee''' (31 December 1911 – 29 July 1970), was an [[United States|American]] child actor. He appeared in 56 films between [[1916 in film|1916]] and [[1925 in film|1925]]. Best remembered in the 1919 film ''[[The Miracle Man (1919 film)|The Miracle Man]]'', he was the little boy on crutches healed by the phoney faith healer just after [[Lon Chaney, Sr.|Lon Chaney]].

He was born in [[Utah]], [[USA]] and died in [[Los Angeles, California]].

==Selected filmography==
*''[[The Miracle Man (1919 film)|The Miracle Man]]'' (1919)
*''[[Bonds of Love]]'' (1919)
*''[[Nurse Marjorie]]'' (1920)
*''[[The Swamp (1921 film)|The Swamp]]'' (1921)
*''Barefoot Boy'' (1923)
